entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FROST
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
AREAS OF FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

AREAS OF FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
